methods.name: Focus
methods.description: Sets focus on the widget element, if it can be focused and keyboardOperation=true

methods.name: setData
methods.description: Sets the visible text via an object

parameter.name: data
parameter.description: The data object with new value and maxLength

methods.name: setEditable
methods.description:
Sets the state of property «editable»
Used for «editable» binding; method is called exclusevely by the framework

parameter.name: editable
metaData
ellipsis
parameter.description: The ellipsis property value

parameter.name: value
keyboard
parameter.description: The keyboard property value

parameter.name: maxLength
parameter.description: The maximum length of the value

methods.name: setParentCoWiId
methods.description: Used to inherit parentCoWiId inside of compound widgets to inner widgets which are not projected, e.g. inner widgets of Login widget

parameter.name: value

methods.name: setPlaceholder
methods.description: Sets a short hint that describes the expected value of the input field

parameter.name: placeholder
parameter.description: The placeholder property value

parameter.name: value
submitOnChange
parameter.description: The submitOnChange property value

parameter.name: value
value
parameter.description: The new value

parameter.name: value

methods.name: SubmitChange
methods.description:
Send value to the server, if binding for this widget exists.
Usage of this method will only make sense, if submitOnChange=false, as otherwise changes are submitted automatically.

events.name: Click
events.description: Fired when element is clicked on.

parameter.name: origin
parameter.description: id of widget that triggered this event

parameter.name: horizontalPos
parameter.description: horizontal position of click in pixel i.e '10px'

parameter.name: verticalPos
parameter.description: vertical position of click in pixel i.e '10px'

events.name: DisabledClick
events.description: Fired when disabled element is clicked on.

parameter.name: origin
parameter.description: id of widget that triggered this event

parameter.name: hasPermission
parameter.description: defines if the state is caused due to missing roles of the current user

parameter.name: horizontalPos
parameter.description: horizontal position of click in pixel i.e '10px'

parameter.name: verticalPos
parameter.description: vertical position of click in pixel i.e '10px'

events.name: EnableChanged
events.description: Fired when operability of the widget changes.

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: operability

events.name: FocusIn
events.description: Fired when the widgets gets focus

events.name: FocusOut
events.description: Fired when the widgets lost focus

parameter.name: contentId
parameter.description: content id of the widget where the drag operation has ended

parameter.name: widgetId
parameter.description: id of the widget where the drag operation has ended

parameter.name: contentId
parameter.description: content id of the widget that has been entering the droppable widget

parameter.name: widgetId
parameter.description: id of the widget that has been entering the droppable widget

parameter.name: contentId
parameter.description: content id of the widget that has been leaving the droppable widget

parameter.name: widgetId
parameter.description: id of the widget that has been leaving the droppable widget

parameter.name: contentId
parameter.description: content id of the widget where the drag operation has been started

parameter.name: widgetId
parameter.description: id of the widget where the drag operation has been started

parameter.name: contentId
parameter.description: content id of the widget that has been dropped on the droppable widget

parameter.name: widgetId
parameter.description: id of the widget that has been dropped on the droppable widget

parameter.name: value

events.name: VisibleChanged
events.description: Fired when the visibility of the widget changes.

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: visibility

properties.name: draggable
properties.description: Make widget draggable.

properties.name: ellipsis
properties.description: If true, overflow of text is symbolized with an ellipsis.

properties.name: enable
properties.description: Initial option to enable widget.

properties.name: inputRestriction
properties.description:
Indicates the set of characters that a user can enter into the TextInput
If not defined (=default), there is no restriction.

properties.name: keyboard
properties.description: Determines if internal soft keyboard should open

properties.name: maxLength
properties.description:
The maxLength attribute specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in the TextInput
If maxLength is less than 0, there is no restriction.

properties.name: permissionOperate
properties.description: restricts operability to users, which have given roles

properties.name: permissionView
properties.description: restricts visibility to users, which have given roles

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: Specifies a short hint that describes the expected value of the input field

properties.name: style
properties.description: reference to a style for this widget type

properties.name: submitOnChange
properties.description: Determines if changes, triggered by user input, should be sent immediately to the server.

properties.name: tabIndex
properties.description:
sets if a widget should have autofocus enabled (0), the order of the focus (>0),
or if autofocus should be disabled (-1)

properties.name: tooltip
properties.description: reference to a tooltip for a widget

properties.name: value
properties.description: Value displayed by the widget

properties.name: visible
properties.description: change visibility

properties.name: maxHeight
properties.description: maximum outer height of widget

properties.name: minHeight
properties.description: minimum outer height of widget

properties.name: maxWidth
properties.description: maximum outer width of widget

properties.name: minWidth
properties.description: minimum outer width of widget

properties.name: zIndex
properties.description:
The zIndex property specifies the z-order of a widget and its childs.
When widgets overlap, z-order determines which one covers the other. A widget with a larger zIndex generally covers a widget with a lower one.
The zIndex must be unique within a content.

properties.name: left
properties.description: absolute position measured from left boundary of parent container

properties.name: top
properties.description: absolute position measured from top boundary of parent container

properties.name: height
properties.description: outer height of widget

properties.name: width
properties.description: outer width of widget

descriptions.de: Ermöglicht dem Benutzer einen Text einzugeben
descriptions.en: Enables the user to enter a text

Description: Sets the border width of the widget. For further information, please see its type
Sets the border width of the widget while writing in. For further information, please see its type
Sets the border width of the widget when disbaled. For further information, please see its type
Sets the radius of the widget rounded corners. For further information, please see its type
Sets the background color of the widget
Sets the background color of the widget when disabled
Sets the background color of the widget as a gradient. For further information, please see CSS Gradients
Sets the background color of the widget when disabled as a gradient. For further information, please see CSS Gradients property
Sets the border color of the widget. For further information, please see its type
Sets the border color of the widget when disabled. For further information, please see its type
Style of the border of the widget. For further information, please see its type
Sets the color of the displayed text
Sets the color of the displayed placeholder
Sets the color of the displayed text when the widget is disabled
Sets the border color of the widget while writing in. For further information, please see its type
Sets the background color of the widget while writing in
Sets the color of the displayed text while writing
Sets the alignment of the text. For further information, please see its type
Sets the opacity of the widget
Sets the font name of the displayed text
Sets the font size of the displayed text in pixel
If **true**, it sets the font style to bold
Sets the rotation of the widget with respect to its center. Positive values for clockwise direction
If **true**, it sets the font style to italic
Sets the shadow effect of the widget. For further information, please see its type
Sets a space around the displayed text. For further information, please see its type
Sets a space around the widget. For further information, please see its type
